name: To verify user is able to upload the  jpeg type content from signage application

testSteps.description: Given User is on workorder signin page
When User sign in with valid credential of Account Owner
Then User tap on the "Users" link from side navigation
Given user is on the dashboard page of workorder application
And User click on side menu of "Manage Kiosk" button
And user selects the tag kiosk page
And user clicks on the upload content or manage content button

And user upload the image type content in the upload content field
| image |
| png.png |

And user fills all the details
| title | description | internalDescription |
| shefali | testing1234 | testing12345 |
And user clicks  on the submit button
Then success message should be displayed " Signage content has been added successfully. "

exception.message:
Expected condition failed: waiting for By.xpath: //*[contains(text(),' Signage content has been added successfully. ')]/.. to be displayed (tried for 5 second(s) with 100 milliseconds interval)
